ModMetaData.name: Frostshards
ModMetaData.author: Myf
ModMetaData.description: An Fantasy alternative for creating freezers. -Passive Coolers Tech need to be Reseachered to build Frostshards. -Frostshards are a type of crystal that are said to have originated on Frostworlds but to have been manufactured by Alchemical Scholars. Frostshards are not formed by the harsh cold enviroment, but instead are often attributed to have been the reason worlds fall to the cold. You have developed and researched Ancient Alchemical Texts and decyphered the crypitc ritual to create Frostshards.
